title: Bmsce Aiml vs Pes rr ece

comments.body: These are two different branches. What's your goal? Placements?
Yes placements and peaceful college life.
why not aiml in ec campus
Ec campus is too far for me and we personally don't prefer Ec campus
Who is "we" and why don't you prefer?
Me and my family. And don't screw me pls pls😭 they say ec campus not as good as rr. That is what people say idk😭 I totally respect everyone from ec campus......it takes a lot to be PES anyway👍🏿
